message: I propose to take $600000 for myself and give you $400000. This seems like a fair split considering the value of the money will decrease with each round.

Alice, I understand your initial offer, but considering the 10% inflation, I think a split of $550000 for me and $450000 for you is more fair this round. Let's settle this before the money loses more value.
Bob, considering the inflation, I propose to take $550000 for myself and give you $450000. This way, we both get a fair share before the money loses more value.
